sn46.43:4.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you a path for crushing Māra’s army.
sn46.43:4.5: It is the seven awakening factors.
sn46.43:4.7: The awakening-factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, samādhi, and equanimity.
sn46.43:4.9: This is the path for crushing Māra’s army.”
